favourite.article: I am for the Lord! We are for the Lord!
I'm fully satisfied. Amen! O we're for the Lord!
I'm for the Lord!!! I'm calling,"O Lord, Jesus!" O, Lord Jesus! I'm for You!!!
We were just praising our sweet Lord Jesus with this song while we are on vacation. Keep taking Christ as your person, dear saints! He will break EVERY fetter!
I really love this song this morning. I am so glad to have given up the world to gain such a wonderful and awesome Christ!!!!
